Hello, Website!

# My first section

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(fivethirtyeight)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=cyl, y= mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x= "Number of cylinders", y = "Miles per gallon")
```


# My second section

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(maps)

us_state_map <- map_data("state") %>%
  as_data_frame()
police_killings %>%
  filter(state != "HI", state != "AK") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = longitude, y = latitude))+ 
  geom_path(data = us_state_map, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), size = 0.1) +
  geom_point(aes(col = raceethnicity), size = 3, alpha = 0.3) +
  ggtitle("Police Killings in America by Race")
```
